data.description:
## Problem
No guidance in CLAUDE.md for reliable sub-agent delegation patterns.

## Proposed Additions
1. Sub-agent verification protocol (always verify file changes persisted)
2. When to use sub-agents vs direct work
3. Language patterns for clear delegation
4. Recovery procedures when sub-agent changes don't persist
5. Director pattern documentation with parallel execution

## Key Points to Document
- Sub-agents may work in isolated contexts
- Always verify state changes after sub-agent returns
- Don't trust success reports for critical state changes
- Use explicit file paths and line numbers in delegation
- Consider storing diffs for recovery

properties.retrospective: Already implemented in commit 48351c06. Added critical warning, verification steps, recovery procedures, and delegation template to CLAUDE.md section 6 (Using Sub-Agents).
